title: AMC Stock Jumps on Revenue Guidance for Holiday Quarter
sub_head: Movie-theater chain posted preliminary fourth-quarter results that showed revenue topping analyst expectations
body:
Shares of AMC Entertainment Holdings Inc. jumped as much as 13% in premarket trading after the company posted preliminary fourth-quarter results that showed revenue topping analyst expectations.
Chief Executive Adam Aron said the quarterly results will be the companyâ€™s strongest since before the Covid-19 pandemic gutted the movie-theater industry almost two years ago.
